About Us
iCode Guru's mission is to promote the programming at scale. (100% Free)
Our Mission
At iCodeGuru (registered in California, USA) we're focused on a mission to uplift promising talent from underprivileged areas and help them reach their full potential in the tech sector.

We collaborate with top Silicon Valley talent to offer extensive training, mentorship, and direction. This empowers our students with the cutting-edge skills and industry acumen needed to secure prestigious careers at leading tech companies.

Beyond immediate employment, we empower our students with the entrepreneurial spirit and experience required to become future industry leaders. They graduate not only as highly talented engineers and diligent developers but also with the confidence and ability to start their own successful ventures.
Contact Us
Email: info@icode.guru
Location: San Jose, CA, USA

Muhammad Talha
do connect with him/he on LinkedIn Muhammad Talha | LinkedIn

A PhD researcher at the University of Missouri-Kansas City, specializing in 3D Point Cloud Compression, Denoising, and Deblocking using SparseConv and advanced ML. Skilled in Python, PyTorch, Minkowski Engine, and MySQL, with hands-on experience in backend development, robotic vision, and IoT. Also experienced in mechanical control systems and electrical systems including transmission lines, VFDs, and power control circuits.

His tech stack spans C++, Python, React, Node.js, Flask, TensorFlow, and more. Azib is open to collaborative projects and software engineering roles.

Meet the iCodeGuru Team
Dr. Zafar Shahid (President) Zafar Shahid, PhD | LinkedIn

A seasoned software professional with over 15 years of experience in real-time systems, multimedia, and network stacks across embedded, desktop, and immersive platforms like Windows, Linux, Android, and Oculus. Expert in low-latency pipelines, video codecs, streaming protocols, and DSP firmware. Proficient in C/C++, Python, and multimedia tools like FFMpeg and OpenMAX. Skilled across the full software development lifecycle, from requirement analysis to deployment.
Rizwan Ghaffar (Senior Vice President) Rizwan Ghaffar | LinkedIn

With over 15 years of experience in wireless communications—including 5G, LTE, satellite, WiFi, and Bluetooth—this expert specializes in algorithm design, hardware architecture, and system optimization. Skilled in Python, C/C++, and MATLAB, with a proven track record of end-to-end project development and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about teaching, performance debugging, and contributing to impactful advancements in wireless technologies.
Kaleem Anwar (Senior Vice President) Kaleem Anwar | LinkedIn

An experienced team and tech leader with a strong track record in building and guiding high-performing teams. Skilled System Architect with expertise in Android, Embedded Linux, and RTOS, leading full product lifecycles across smartphones, tablets, STBs, and AR/VR. Hands-on with advanced technologies in AI, ML, DL, computer vision, and operating systems. Passionate about driving innovation and delivering impactful products.
Amir Khan (VP Branding & Marketing) Amir Khan | LinkedIn

An AI-driven Digital Marketing Strategist and Digital Transformation Expert with over a decade of experience empowering businesses and executives through AI, ML, and data-driven strategies. K K Builders specializes in crafting fine homes that blend quality, elegance, and functionality. With a commitment to excellence in design and construction, they deliver residential spaces tailored to modern lifestyles. Trusted for precision, reliability, and attention to detail, K K Builders turns dreams into beautifully built homes.
What do we offer ?
Weekly Webinars
We conduct weekly webinars ever Saturday 9:00 PM PKT to help students interact with Silicon Valley Engineers.
Data Structures and Algorithms
If you want to boost your learning, you should learn skills in a cohort. We provide many cohorts so you can engage with others to enhance your skills.
Career Services
Get your CV, Statement of Purpose, Linkedin reviewed by our experts for free.
Hackathon Announcement
Our dedicated team is responsible for announcing webinars every month.
Machine Learning/ Data Science Announcement
Learn emerging technologies in cohort to maximize your learning journey.
Full Stack Web & App development courses
Advance Courses of Website and Application development are taught by industry experts.
IELTS & GRE Classes
Prepare IELTS & GRE for 100 percent free to avail international opportunities.
